guides.title: Hide Last Seen & Online Status
guides.description: Control who can see when you were last active on WhatsApp and your online status.

steps.title: Open WhatsApp Settings
steps.instruction: Tap on the three dots in the top-right corner and select 'Settings'.

steps.title: Go to Privacy Settings
steps.instruction: Tap on 'Account' then select 'Privacy'.

steps.title: Configure Last Seen
steps.instruction: Tap on 'Last seen and online' and choose 'My contacts', 'My contacts except...', or 'Nobody'.

steps.title: Hide Online Status
steps.instruction: Toggle off 'Who can see when I'm online' to prevent others from seeing your online status.

guides.title: Control Profile Photo Privacy
guides.description: Choose who can see your profile picture on WhatsApp.

steps.title: Open Privacy Settings
steps.instruction: Go to Settings > Account > Privacy.

steps.title: Select Profile Photo
steps.instruction: Tap on 'Profile photo' option.

steps.title: Choose Visibility
steps.instruction: Select 'Everyone', 'My contacts', 'My contacts except...', or 'Nobody'.

guides.title: Set Status Privacy
guides.description: Control who can view your WhatsApp status updates.

steps.title: Open Privacy Settings
steps.instruction: Navigate to Settings > Account > Privacy.

steps.title: Configure Status Privacy
steps.instruction: Tap on 'Status' and choose who can see your status updates.

steps.title: Customize Audience
steps.instruction: Select 'My contacts', 'My contacts except...', or 'Only share with...' to customize.

guides.title: Silence Unknown Callers
guides.description: Automatically silence calls from unknown numbers to reduce spam.

steps.title: Open Privacy Settings
steps.instruction: Go to Settings > Privacy.

steps.title: Enable Silence Unknown Callers
steps.instruction: Scroll down and toggle on 'Silence unknown callers'.

steps.title: Review Settings
steps.instruction: Unknown calls will now go to your call list without ringing.

guides.title: Enable Disappearing Messages
guides.description: Set messages to automatically disappear after a specified time period.

steps.title: Open Chat Settings
steps.instruction: Open any chat, tap on the contact/group name at the top.

steps.title: Enable Disappearing Messages
steps.instruction: Tap on 'Disappearing messages' and select a duration (24 hours, 7 days, or 90 days).

steps.title: Set Default Timer
steps.instruction: To set for all new chats, go to Settings > Privacy > Default message timer.

guides.title: Control Who Can Add You to Groups
guides.description: Restrict who can add you to WhatsApp groups.

steps.title: Open Privacy Settings
steps.instruction: Navigate to Settings > Account > Privacy.

steps.title: Select Groups
steps.instruction: Tap on 'Groups' option.

steps.title: Choose Restriction Level
steps.instruction: Select 'Everyone', 'My contacts', or 'My contacts except...' to control group invites.

guides.title: Manage Live Location Sharing
guides.description: Control and stop sharing your live location with contacts.

steps.title: Check Active Location Sharing
steps.instruction: Open any chat and tap the '+' icon, then 'Location'.

steps.title: View Live Locations
steps.instruction: You'll see any active live location sharing at the top.

steps.title: Stop Sharing
steps.instruction: Tap on the active location and select 'Stop sharing' to end location sharing.
